Uses of Interface
org.divxdede.swing.busy.BusyIcon

Packages that use BusyIcon
org.divxdede.swing.busy.icon   
org.divxdede.swing.busy.ui   
 

Uses of BusyIcon in org.divxdede.swing.busy.icon
 

Classes in org.divxdede.swing.busy.icon that implement BusyIcon
 class AbstractBusyIcon
          An implementation of the BusyIcon interface to serve as a basis for implementing various kinds of Busy Icons.
 class DecoratorBusyIcon
          An implementation of the BusyIcon interface to serve as a basis for implementing Busy Icons based on another icon extended with busy capabilities.
 class DefaultBusyIcon
          Default BusyIcon implementation that paint an icon and draw on overlay a small progress bar.
 class InfiniteBusyIcon
          An infinite icon rendering always an undeterminate state as long as the model is busy (whenever the model's state).
 class RadialBusyIcon
          BusyIcon drawing a radial progress bar (circle) below the decorated icon
Some methods can be used for customize the LaF of this icon: DecoratorBusyIcon.setDecoratedIcon(Icon) : Define the basic icon to draw RadialBusyIcon.setProgressBarDiameter(int) : Define the diameter of the progress bar (the bar is centered on this icon) RadialBusyIcon.setProgressBarThickness(int) : Define the thickness of the progress bar RadialBusyIcon.setProgressBarBackground(java.awt.Paint) : Define the background color of the progress bar RadialBusyIcon.setProgressBarForeground(java.awt.Paint) : Define the foreground color of the progress bar Theses methods defines some customization of the LaF's icon.
 

Uses of BusyIcon in org.divxdede.swing.busy.ui
 

Methods in org.divxdede.swing.busy.ui that return BusyIcon
 BusyIcon BusyLayerUI.getBusyIcon()
          Return the BusyIcon used by this ui for render the busy animation.
 BusyIcon BasicBusyLayerUI.getBusyIcon()
          Return the BusyIcon used by this ui for render the busy animation.
 

Methods in org.divxdede.swing.busy.ui with parameters of type BusyIcon
 void BusyLayerUI.setBusyIcon(BusyIcon icon)
          Define the BusyIcon to use by this ui to render the busy animation.
 void BasicBusyLayerUI.setBusyIcon(BusyIcon icon)
          Define the BusyIcon to use by this ui to render the busy animation.
